contentrichtext.text: {{Expand French|date=December 2008|Quérigut}} {{Infobox French commune |name = Quérigut |region = Midi-Pyrénées |department = Ariège |arrondissement = Foix |canton = Quérigut |INSEE = 09239 |postal code = 09460 |mayor = Roger Vidal |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Donezan |longitude = 2.0992 |latitude = 42.7 |elevation m = 1250 |elevation min m = 1022 |elevation max m = 2359 |area km2 = 36.4 |population = 139 |population date = 2008 }} ''' Quérigut ''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Ariège]] [[Departments of France|department]] in southwestern [[France]]. ==Population== Inhabitants are called ''Quérigutois''. {{Historical populations |align=left| 1962|197| 1968|234| 1975|171| 1982|153| 1990|142| 1999|116| 2008|139| }} {{clear-left}} ==See also== *[[Communes of the Ariège department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} {{Ariège communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Querigut}} [[Category:Communes of Ariège]] {{Ariège-geo-stub}}
